info.title: IRN API v1
info.description: Allows users to create, update and configure IRN data.

get.summary: Get all the contact custom fields
Get a specific Contact custom field's details
Get details on a specific contact relationship
Get all the relationships where the given symbol or contact identifier has been tagged in a relationship
Get list of the contact roles configured in your group
Get list of all contacts in your group along with some of their standard field data

parameters.name: customFieldValues
parameters.description: Includes custom field values in response if true

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter results on the combination of fullName, emailAddress, identifier and employerName

parameters.name: includeLastMeetingDate
parameters.description: If true, returns when they were last tagged as an attendee in an IRN meeting

get.summary: Get all custom field and standard field details on a specific contact

patch.summary: Edit a contact’s standard field and custom field data

get.summary: Get the About field content for a specific contact
Get all notes and meetings where a specific contact was tagged
Returns a list of a contact’s relationships
Get list of the contact types configured in your group
Get list of the phone types configured in your group
Get list of the relationship categories configured in your group
Get list of the relationships configured in your group
